author: Robert Purchese
description:
It's safe to say that Irish video game maker Brendan Greene, known by the alias "PlayerUnknown", is an ideas man. He's credited with creating and popularising the battle royale genre, initially experimenting with it in an Arma 3 mod, then building it into zombie game H1Z1, before making the extraordinarily successful multiplayer shooter PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds - or PUBG as we know it now. Big ideas are irresistible to Brendan Greene, and few ideas come bigger than the one he currently has, to remake the internet.

Read more
title: Did you know Brendan "PlayerUnknown" Greene, the creator of PUBG, wants to remake the internet?

author: Robert Purchese
description:
Hello and welcome back to our regular feature where we write a little bit about some of the games we've been playing. This week, Kelsey tries to get Dark Souls 3 working in co-op; a laid-up Ed discovers the thrill of speedrunning; Tom applauds the Viewfinder team; Marie is positively in love with Winter Burrow; Bertie is probably in love with Dispatch; Victoria has no idea what she's doing in Hyrule Warriors; and Will gets really into mechs.

Read more
title: What we've been playing - "I've not fallen this hard for a game in years"
